attributes.action: To start a petition for speed bumps,traffic lights on south road Dundee Scotland
attributes.additional_details: Because we have asked the council years ago but it didn’t happen the traffic is very heavy on south road Dundee with lorries,cars, but also buses the buses have increased with all coming up south road also the building of new houses will also increase the traffic
attributes.background: Put speed bumps or traffic lights or speed camera’s on south road as it’s a very dangerous road

rejection.details:
Decisions about local planning decisions are a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.

If you are concerned about planning decisions in your area you could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
